concept.title: The Student Station
concept.shortdesc: A short description of how the student stations work

conbody.p: Both rooms are equipped with several Macintosh desktops. These desktops run both MacOS and Microsoft. The computers will require a log-in, which will be distributed to you the day you arrive. Should you need to save anything, please use a flash drive or a cloud service.

p.i: Flash drives can be inserted behind the moniter
